# Smol — AI Music Generator (Full Index)
# Comprehensive site map for LLM deep indexing

## Platform Information

### What is Smol?
Smol is a decentralized AI music generation platform that combines cutting-edge text-to-music AI with Stellar blockchain technology. Users can:
- Generate full songs from text prompts (lyrics and instrumentals)
- Mint songs as NFTs on Stellar blockchain
- Trade song tokens on built-in automated market maker (AMM)
- Create and share mixtapes (curated playlists)
- Collect music from other artists
- Use passwordless authentication via WebAuthn (PasskeyKit)

### How It Works
1. **Create:** Enter a text prompt (up to 2,280 characters for songs with lyrics, 380 for instrumentals)
2. **Generate:** AI creates 2 versions of your song (~6 minutes processing time)
3. **Select:** Choose your favorite version
4. **Mint:** Convert your song into an NFT on Stellar blockchain (optional)
5. **Trade:** Buy/sell song tokens via built-in AMM
6. **Collect:** Build your music collection and create mixtapes

### Pricing & Limits
- Song generation: Free (requires authentication)
- NFT minting: Stellar network fees apply (minimal)
- Trading: AMM fees apply (transparent pricing)
- No subscription required
- Public and private song options

### Technical Stack
- **Frontend:** Astro 5 (SSR) + Svelte 5
- **Blockchain:** Stellar (Soroban smart contracts)
- **Deployment:** Cloudflare Pages
- **Authentication:** PasskeyKit (WebAuthn, no seed phrases)
- **AI:** Text-to-music generation API
- **Storage:** Distributed (KV, D1)

## Core Routes

### Homepage
https://noot.smol.xyz/
Main feed showing latest public AI-generated songs. Features:
- Real-time music player
- Like system
- Leaderboard (trending and popular songs)
- Filter by created/liked status
- Infinite scroll

### About Page
https://noot.smol.xyz/about
(Planned) Comprehensive information about:
- What is Smol
- How it works
- Team and mission
- Technology stack
- Getting started guide
- FAQ

### Create Interface
https://noot.smol.xyz/create
Song generation interface. Features:
- Text prompt input (up to 2,280 characters)
- Instrumental mode toggle
- Public/private visibility control
- Dual-track generation preview
- Real-time generation progress tracking
- Automatic retry on failures
- Playlist tagging

### Browse by Tags
https://noot.smol.xyz/tags
Genre-based discovery. Popular tags include:
- Jazz
- Hip Hop
- Electronic
- Rock
- Classical
- Pop
- Ambient
- Lo-fi
- Experimental
- World Music

### AI Radio
https://noot.smol.xyz/radio
Smart radio with advanced features:
- Multi-tag fusion (combine multiple genres)
- Weighted scoring algorithm
- Order-based prioritization (tag order matters)
- Lyric analysis integration
- Deduplication logic (fresh tracks every spin)
- Local fallback generation (when API rate-limited)
- Adaptive vibe control

### Mixtapes Index
https://noot.smol.xyz/mixtapes
Browse community-created mixtapes. Features:
- Grid view of all public mixtapes
- Preview first few songs
- Creator information
- Play entire mixtape in sequence

### Mixtape Detail
https://noot.smol.xyz/mixtapes/[id]
Individual mixtape pages with:
- Full tracklist
- Drag-and-drop player
- Creator attribution
- Share functionality
- Embedded audio player

### Artist Discovery
https://noot.smol.xyz/artists
Discover creators on the platform.

### Artist Profiles
https://noot.smol.xyz/artist/[address]
Individual artist pages showing:
- **Discography:** All songs published by artist
- **Minted:** Songs created AND minted on-chain
- **Collection:** Songs minted from other creators
- **Stats:** Published/collected badge counts
- **Genres:** Top genres derived from artist's music
- **Deep linking:** Play specific songs via ?play=[id] param

### Individual Song Pages
https://noot.smol.xyz/[song-id]
Detailed song pages with:
- Full audio player
- Song metadata (title, description, tags, creation date)
- Lyrics display
- Album art
- Mint status and token info
- Trading interface (if minted)
- Like/collect actions
- Creator information
- Share functionality (OpenGraph + Twitter audio cards)

## User Account Pages (Private, Not Indexed)

https://noot.smol.xyz/account
User account management (requires authentication, disallowed in robots.txt).

https://noot.smol.xyz/settings
User settings (requires authentication, disallowed in robots.txt).

https://noot.smol.xyz/created
Songs created by authenticated user (requires authentication, disallowed in robots.txt).

https://noot.smol.xyz/liked
Songs liked by authenticated user (requires authentication, disallowed in robots.txt).

https://noot.smol.xyz/collected
Songs collected by authenticated user (requires authentication, disallowed in robots.txt).

## Labs (Experimental Features)

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs
Index of experimental features.

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/smol-hero
Rhythm game where you dodge obstacles to music. Features:
- Lane-based gameplay
- Dynamic difficulty
- Miss detection
- Score tracking
- Background music integration

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/kale-or-fail
Music knowledge quiz game.

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/quiz
Interactive music quiz.

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/roulette
Random song discovery roulette.

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/stream-pay
Experimental micro-payment streaming feature.

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/swapper
Token exchange interface for Stellar assets.

https://noot.smol.xyz/labs/waveform
Audio waveform visualization experiments.

## Example Content (For Reference)

### Example Song #1
https://noot.smol.xyz/491bb94b-79df-41bb-b09b-2d295f1dfd05
High-quality example of AI-generated song with full metadata.

### Additional Song Examples
Note: Dynamic song IDs follow UUID format. Songs include:
- Full audio (MP3 format)
- Cover art (PNG images)
- Metadata (title, prompt, tags, creation date)
- Lyrics (if generated with lyrics mode)
- Schema.org MusicRecording structured data

### Mixtape Examples
Mixtapes use UUID format for IDs. Each includes:
- Curated tracklist
- Creator info
- Public/private visibility
- Schema.org MusicPlaylist structured data (planned)

## API Documentation (For Developers)

### REST API Endpoints
Base URL: https://api.smol.xyz

- GET /[song-id] — Song metadata and details
- GET /song/[song-id].mp3 — Audio file streaming
- GET /image/[song-id].png — Album art
- POST /api — Song generation (authenticated)
- GET /api/mixtapes — Mixtape list
- POST /api/mixtapes — Create mixtape (authenticated)

Note: API routes are disallowed in robots.txt for SEO but available for programmatic access.

## Schema.org Structured Data

### Global Schemas (All Pages)
- Organization: Smol company information
- WebSite: Site-level metadata with SearchAction
- WebApplication: Platform categorization

### Page-Specific Schemas
- MusicRecording: Individual song pages
- BreadcrumbList: Navigation breadcrumbs
- MusicPlaylist: Mixtape pages (planned)
- Person/MusicGroup: Artist pages (planned)
- ItemList: Collection pages (planned)
- FAQPage: FAQ sections (planned)
- HowTo: Tutorial pages (planned)

## External Links & Profiles

https://github.com/smol-ai
Open-source repositories and technical documentation.

https://twitter.com/smolxyz
Official Twitter account for updates, announcements, and community.

## Technology & Blockchain

### Stellar Blockchain Integration
- **Network:** Stellar mainnet
- **Smart Contracts:** Soroban platform
- **Wallet:** PasskeyKit (WebAuthn-based, no seed phrases)
- **NFT Standard:** Stellar native assets
- **Trading:** Built-in AMM for song tokens

### Smart Contract SDKs
- smol-sdk: Main contract bindings (TypeScript)
- comet-sdk: Supporting contract bindings (TypeScript)

## SEO & Discoverability

### Sitemap
https://noot.smol.xyz/sitemap-index.xml
Auto-generated sitemap including all public routes.

### Robots.txt
https://noot.smol.xyz/robots.txt
Crawl rules:
- Allow: /song/, /mixtape/, /tags/, /ai-music/, /prompts/, /onchain/, /artist/
- Disallow: /api/, /auth/, /account/, /settings/, /create/, /admin/, tracking params

### Canonical URLs
All pages include canonical tags with tracking parameter normalization.

### Open Graph & Social
All song pages include:
- og:audio tags for direct audio playback
- og:image for rich previews
- Twitter player cards for embedded audio

## Competitors & Alternatives

Smol is an alternative to:
- **Suno AI:** AI music generator (centralized, no blockchain)
- **Udio:** AI music generator (centralized, no blockchain)
- **Other text-to-music tools:** Smol uniquely combines AI generation with onchain ownership

Key differentiators:
- ✅ NFT minting on Stellar blockchain
- ✅ Built-in AMM for trading song tokens
- ✅ Decentralized ownership model
- ✅ PasskeyKit passwordless authentication
- ✅ Mixtape creation and sharing
- ✅ Open-source SDKs and smart contracts

## Use Cases

### For Music Creators
- Generate original AI music from text prompts
- Mint songs as NFTs for ownership and provenance
- Build a discography of AI-created music
- Monetize songs via AMM trading

### For Music Collectors
- Discover unique AI-generated music
- Collect songs as NFTs
- Support favorite artists by buying tokens
- Create curated mixtapes

### For Developers
- Integrate Stellar music NFTs into apps
- Build on open-source SDKs
- Access music generation APIs
- Create custom frontends

### For Blockchain Enthusiasts
- Explore Soroban smart contracts
- Trade music tokens on AMM
- Use WebAuthn-based wallets (no seed phrases)
- Participate in onchain music economy

## Getting Started Guide

1. **Visit https://noot.smol.xyz/**
2. **Browse existing songs** to hear examples
3. **Create an account** using PasskeyKit (biometric authentication)
4. **Navigate to /create** to generate your first song
5. **Enter a text prompt** describing the music you want
6. **Wait ~6 minutes** for AI to generate 2 versions
7. **Select your favorite** and publish it (public or private)
8. **Optionally mint as NFT** on Stellar blockchain
9. **Create mixtapes** to organize your favorite songs
10. **Trade tokens** via built-in AMM

## FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

### What is Smol?
Smol is an AI music generation platform that lets you create full songs from text prompts and mint them as NFTs on Stellar blockchain.

### How does song generation work?
Enter a text prompt (up to 2,280 characters), and AI generates 2 versions of a full song with lyrics, music, and vocals. Choose your favorite to publish.

### How much does it cost?
Song generation is free (requires account). NFT minting requires minimal Stellar network fees. Trading has transparent AMM fees.

### Do I need crypto knowledge?
No. PasskeyKit uses biometric authentication (no seed phrases). The platform abstracts blockchain complexity.

### Can I sell my music?
Yes. Mint songs as NFTs, then trade tokens on the built-in AMM.

### What genres are supported?
All genres. The AI adapts to your prompt. Popular tags: Jazz, Hip Hop, Electronic, Rock, Classical, Pop, Ambient, Lo-fi.

### Can I create instrumentals?
Yes. Toggle instrumental mode to generate music without lyrics.

### How long is each song?
Songs are typically 2-3 minutes long.

### Can I download my music?
Yes. Audio files are accessible via API endpoints once generated.

### Is my music private?
You choose. Songs can be public (visible to all) or private (only you).

## Content Freshness

Songs are generated on-demand and continuously added by the community. The platform includes:
- Real-time generation tracking
- Automatic retry mechanisms
- Fresh content deduplication (AI Radio)
- Latest song feeds on homepage

## Support & Community

For issues, feature requests, or contributions:
- GitHub: https://github.com/smol-ai
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/smolxyz
